title: Removing the remake option
body:
I know afkers suck but the remake option is more annoying. 

It's like a late late dodge. 

It's so late it's just tragic after say 5-9 dodges. 

I personally (The best Fiora) don't like the remake option.

It is relatively new. 

I say we get it removed before we get used to it. 

Let's vote...  I hate your votes typically are always opposite to mine but here

replies.body: I don't want to play with a 4v5 or against the 4v5. I would rather remake and not have to wait 20 minutes for them to FF
keep remakes but give team points who "won" liek a portion of lp

Everyone who disagrees with me about this or anything else with me in this game I would beat in a fist fight in real life.  In fact I could beat all gazillion of you at the same time in the UFC and TKO all of you at the same time.
